58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}

58ca6c233f02c.Name: LLP015 Selected value to fields
58ca6c233f02c.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}

58efbd46c0cbd.Name: LLP018 Confirm the entered address
58efbd46c0cbd.Output_template: {"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,if({subParam} like '%mAl%','The address must contain a flat or house and road. ','The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. '),''),if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from (select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mAl%',0,1)) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%'or {subParam} like '%mAl%',0,1)) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mPo%',0,1)) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[UBub]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}

props.label: html 1
props.content:
Complete this form to apply for discretionary housing payment.

If you require help with deposit or removal costs do not complete this online form. Instead, please contact your local housing office for further information.

Please note you must be receiving housing benefit or housing element of universal credit to qualify for discretionary housing payment

  • Discretionary housing payment can't cover services which aren't eligible for housing benefit or housing element of universal credit.
  • Discretionary housing payment and housing benefit or housing element combined can't total more than the eligible rent
  • Discretionary housing benefit can't cover shortfalls due to recovery of benefit overpayments

props.label: html 2
props.content:
Please read this declaration carefully before you sign and date it.

I understand the following.

  • If I give information that is incorrect, you may decline this application or recover any discretionary housing payment already awarded.
  • You may check some of the information with other sources as allowed by the law.
  • You may use any information I have provided in connection with this and any other claim for Department for Work & Pensions benefits that I have made or may make. You may give some information to other organisations, such as government departments, local authorities, and private-sector companies such as banks and organisations that may lend me money, if the law allows this.

I know I must let the Portsmouth City Council’s Benefits service know about any change in my circumstance, which might affect this claim.
